R

randMonster() - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.InitTeams
This function is used to generate a random list of monsters containing either 3 to 4.
retalliation(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Role
The function judges the retaliation capability.

run() - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Game
This is the main function to start the game where if the user chooses to play the game will call InitTeams class, encounter class, potionsSelector and StoryLine class.
